item.title: Getting started with Neovim: Notes to self
item.description: This week I wanted to up my python development `fu` by focusing on my tooling. My main criterium was to move fast between definitions and files to understand a new code base. For a while, I have been learning about vim from the ThePrimeagen Youtube channel. His latest video on getting started with Neovim is simply an excellent resource. So I took the time to implement each step following the video.
